title: animalsounds
text: package contains single function, animal_sounds. developed part Forwards R Package Development workshops. animal_sounds function takes two arguments: animal: character, name animal sound: character, sound made animal sound argument optional.
code: library(animalsounds) animal_sounds("cow", "moo") ## [1] "The cow says moo!" animal_sounds("polar bear") ## [1] "The polar bear makes no sound."
